job_purpose: Design, build, and scale real-world applications powered by large language models (LLMs) in the mining & energy domain.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify high-impact AI use cases
Understand mining and engineering domain challenges and develop AI solutions
Design and build software applications and APIs leveraging LLMs
Implement prompt engineering strategies and optimization techniques
Create autonomous agents for complex multi-step tasks
Integrate LLM-powered features into products with strong UX
Develop evaluation frameworks for LLM output quality and safety
Stay updated on LLM advancements and contribute to best practices
Write clean, maintainable, and well-documented code
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent
5+ years of professional software engineering experience
Strong proficiency in Python (preferred) or TypeScript/JavaScript
Understanding of prompt engineering and model evaluation
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience with AI development tools and libraries
Knowledge of data privacy and security concerns in AI applications
preferred_qualifications: Understanding of embeddings, vector databases, and RAG
Familiarity with model fine-tuning using Hugging Face Transformers
company_details: A well-known organization in the mining & energy sector, offering the opportunity to work at the frontier of applied AI with a collaborative and high-trust engineering culture.
